评论详情: I got this for my son’s high school graduation. It’s a very attractive bracelet and I love the fact that it’s adjustable. Often he has a hard time with bracelets as he has very large hands but relatively small wrists. This he can get over his hands easily and tighten up on his wrist. I wish the compass was a little darker on the metal but otherwise no complaints. The little message it has is also lovely.
